name: Spin it (Broadbringer)
description:
This is clicker on theme "Rewind"

You able to click on MainHero that on start game is sitting behind the table.

You should farm some cassetts for successful day and make some money.

Look on you garage. Maybe you will see some places that you can use by yours needables. 

Good Luck.

P.S Don't Forget to look on your's worker's inventory - items can break.

Inputs:

Left click on MainHero produce some of spin. Start spin strength is 1.3. Durabillity of casset = 30. You should make 30/1.3 about 30 click for one spinned casset.

Right click on any worker will open an inventory.
